## Timeline

-   ### Age 21 — Marriage
    
    26 Jan 1873 • Chapel of St. Mary’s , Rathmines, Dublin, Ireland
    
    ‘ Laurence Higgins, 21, Bachelor, labourer, Fulham’s Lane, father James Higgins, Labourer to Mary Verlin, 21, spinster, ???mount Lane, father, Michael Verlin, labourer. On church record, she's Maria Vernor, parents Michael Vernor and Margaret Kearney.

-   ### Age 22 — Birth of daughter Margaret Ester Higgins (1874–1912)

-   ### Age 24 — Birth of daughter Mary Jane Higgins (1876–1879)
    
    16 April 1876 • Coombe Hospital / 36 Bishop St., Dublin South, Ireland
    
-   ### Age 26 — Birth of daughter Anne Higgins (1878–)
    
    21 May 1878 • 53 Lower Clanbrassil St, Dublin South, Ireland
    
-   ### Age 27 — Death of daughter Mary Jane Higgins (1876–1879)
    
    2 May 1879 • Cork St. Hospital, Dublin, Ireland
    
-   ### Age 29 — Birth of daughter Bridget Higgins (1881–1881)
    
    7 Sept 1881 • South Dublin Union, Dublin, Ireland
    
-   ### Age 29 — Birth of daughter Mary Jane Higgins (1881–1881)
    
    7 September 1881 • South Dublin Union, Dublin, Ireland
    
-   ### Age 29 — Death
    
    4 October 1881 • South Dublin Union, Dublin, Ireland
